main event: A round red object larger than a basketball was observed in the sky for about one minute in Crescent City, Florida, on July 1, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed above the tree tops, The observation lasted approximately 1 minute, The object stood still for a short time before bursting, The color of the object was red, The conclusion section was left unchecked indicating no definite conclusion was reached.
sighted object: one round object larger than a basketball
